description: At Explore Learning, I learned a lot about the importance of Teamwork and communication. Working in a fast paced, team environment allowed me the opportunity to morph into a real team player. I also of course, developed my skill in teaching and tuition, having better a better ability to pass my skills and knowledge over to others who are willing to learn.

position: BTEC Level 3 Extended Diploma in Software Development
description: During my time at college, I learned a lot of valuable project management skills, including handling real-world client projects. I learned about a variety of areas from previous industry professionals, such as Systems Security, Games Development, Object-Oriented Programming, Web Development and more.
